name: opencti
label: OpenCTI
description: OpenCTI is an open threat intelligence platform where you can store, organize, visualize and share knowledge about cyber threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: access_token
fields.description: Specify the access token to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the access token to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to True.

operations.title: Create Organization
operations.description: Create an Organization based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Organization Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the organization that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the organization that you want to create.

parameters.title: Organization Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the organization that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the organization that you want to create.

parameters.title: Reliability
parameters.name: reliability
parameters.tooltip: Specify the reliability of the organization.
parameters.description: Specify the reliability of the organization. Possible values are: 'A - Completely reliable', 'B - Usually reliable', 'C - Fairly reliable', 'D - Not usually reliable', 'E - Unreliable', 'F - Reliability cannot be judged'.

operations.title: Get Organizations
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of organizations based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of organizations to be returned in response. Default value is 50
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of organizations to be returned in response. Default value is 50

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=

operations.title: Create Label
operations.description: Create a label based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Label Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the label that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the label that you want to create.

operations.title: Get Labels
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of labels based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of labels to be returned in response. Default value is 50
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of labels to be returned in response. Default value is 50

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=

operations.title: Create External Reference
operations.description: Create an external reference object based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: External Reference URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specify the external reference URL of the external reference object that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the external reference URL of the external reference object that you want to create.

parameters.title: Source Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the source name of the external reference object that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the source name of the external reference object that you want to create.

operations.title: Get External References
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of external reference objects based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of external reference objects to be returned in response. Default value is 50
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of external reference objects to be returned in response. Default value is 50

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=

operations.title: Get Marking Definition
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of marking definition objects based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of marking definition objects to be returned in response. Default value is 50
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of marking definition objects to be returned in response. Default value is 50

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=

operations.title: Create Indicator
operations.description: Create an indicator based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of indicator that you want to create. You can select one of the following options: Account, Domain, Email, File-MD5, File-SHA1, File-SHA256, Host, IPv4, IPv6, Registry Key, URL
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of indicator that you want to create.

parameters.title: Indicator Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Specify the value of indicator that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the value of indicator that you want to create.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of indicator that you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of indicator that you want to create.

parameters.title: Score
parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Specify the score of indicator that you want to create. Score range is 0 to 100. Default value is 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the score of indicator that you want to create. Score range is 0 to 100. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: Created By
parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: Specify the organization ID. Use 'Get Organizations' to find all organization IDs or use 'Create Organization' to create a new organization ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the organization ID. Use 'Get Organizations' to find all organization IDs or use 'Create Organization' to create a new organization ID.

parameters.title: Marking Definition ID
parameters.name: marking_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the marking definition ID. Use 'Get Marking Definition' to find all marking definition IDs.
parameters.description: Specify the marking definition ID. Use 'Get Marking Definition' to find all marking definition IDs.

parameters.title: Label ID
parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: Specify the label ID. Use 'Get Labels' to find all label IDs or use 'Create Label' to create a new label ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the label ID. Use 'Get Labels' to find all label IDs or use 'Create Label' to create a new label ID.

parameters.title: External Reference ID
parameters.name: external_reference_id
parameters.description: Specify the external reference ID. Use 'Get External References' to find all external reference IDs or use 'Create External Reference' to create a new external reference ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the external reference ID. Use 'Get External References' to find all external reference IDs or use 'Create External Reference' to create a new external reference ID.

operations.title: Get Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of indicators based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of indicators to be returned in response. Default value is 50
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of indicators to be returned in response. Default value is 50

parameters.title: End Cursor ID
parameters.name: end_cursor_id
parameters.description: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endCursor ID of the pagination from the previous call, from which to begin pagination for this call. eg: WyJpZGVudGl0eS0tMjJmYjkwNTUtZjAzNi01MmFlLWJiZTktM2QyYmZlODk1MDI4Il0=

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the indicator type that you want to filter by. You can select one of the following options: Account, Domain, Email, File-MD5, File-SHA1, File-SHA256, Host, IPv4, IPv6, Registry Key, URL
parameters.tooltip: Specify the indicator type that you want to filter by.

parameters.title: Minimum Score
parameters.name: min_score
parameters.description: Specify the minimum score value to filter by. Values range is 1 to 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the minimum score value to filter by. Values range is 1 to 100.

parameters.title: Maximum Score
parameters.name: max_score
parameters.description: Specify the maximum score value to filter by. Values range is 1 to 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum score value to filter by. Values range is 1 to 100.

operations.title: Delete Indicator
operations.description: Delete indicator based on the indicator ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator that you want to delete.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator that you want to delete.

operations.title: Add Indicator Field
operations.description: Add a field to the indicator. Fields that can be added are marking definition and label.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator for which you want to add the fields.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator for which you want to add the fields.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Select the field that you want to add to the indicator. You can select one of the following: Marking Definition, Label.
parameters.tooltip: Select the field that you want to add to the indicator.

parameters.title: Field ID
parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: Specify marking definition ID or label ID. Use 'Get Marking Definition' or 'Get Labels' action to find the ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify marking definition ID or label ID. Use 'Get Marking Definition' or 'Get Labels' action to find the ID.

operations.title: Update Indicator Field
operations.description: Update the indicator field. Fields that can be updated are score and description.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator for which you want to update the field.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator for which you want to update the field.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Select the field that you want to update. You can select one of the following: Score, Description.
parameters.tooltip: Select the field that you want to update. You can select one of the following: Score, Description.

parameters.title: Field Value
parameters.name: field_value
parameters.description: Specify the value of the field that you want to update.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the value of the field that you want to update.

operations.title: Remove Indicator Field
operations.description: Remove indicator field value. Field values which can be removed are marking definition and label.

parameters.title: Indicator ID
parameters.name: indicator_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the indicator for which you want to remove the field value.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the indicator for which you want to remove the field value.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Select the field that you want to remove from the indicator. You can select one of the following: Marking Definition, Label.
parameters.tooltip: Select the field that you want to remove from the indicator.

parameters.title: Field ID
parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: Specify marking definition ID or label ID. Use 'Get Marking Definition' or 'Get Labels' action to find the ID.
parameters.tooltip: Specify marking definition ID or label ID. Use 'Get Marking Definition' or 'Get Labels' action to find the ID.
